title: (x) Informa��o em Suporte Digital, Lda - ITC Kabel {Franz}
author: pgarcez

comments.content: That's ITC's severely [perverted idea](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000448/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-kabel/book/) of [Kabel](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000448/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/). I really like the latter.

Exactly! I love the typography in that film.. Thanks for reminding me, I'm ordering the poster right now. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000448im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Speaking of the posters: [Corey Holms](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000448/http:/www.coreyholms.com/)' (his movie posters are great, check them out!) [original designs](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000448/http:/www.coreyholms.com/altsite/posters/Lost%20in%20Translation.php) for the posters don't have Kabel yet, they're handlettered instead.. Great stuff either way.
